",identity:"BSW College BPG centre Gadag",link:"#"},{title:"Learning Beyond Limits",content:"IIt’s our honour to celebrated our son’s Birthday with God gifted child we really feel so satisfaction for the celebration, may god bless with lot of love keep smiling tacke care we are always with you.",name:"Viom/Vihaan Pavanlaumar  ",identity:"Karal",link:"#"},{title:"Where Every Child Shines in Their Own Way",content:"Humbled to see the information and support system created by Seva Bharathi, I compliment the people involved in creating this institution.",name:"Ashok Shetter ",identity:"KLE Tech University Hubli",link:"#"}];const pairTestimonials=[];for(let i=0;i<testimonials.length;i+=2){pairTestimonials.push(testimonials.slice(i,i+2));}function TestimonialsSlider(){const[page,setPage]=useState(0);const nextSlide=()=>setPage((page+1)%pairTestimonials.length);const prevSlide=()=>setPage((page-1+pairTestimonials.length)%pairTestimonials.length);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonials__fullscreen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"testimonials__headline",children:"TESTIMONIALS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonials__sliderrow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"testimonials__arrow",onClick:prevSlide,"aria-label":"Previous",children:"<"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonials__cards",children:pairTestimonials[page].map((t,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonial__card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonial__main",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial__text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"testimonial__heading",children:t.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"testimonial__content",children:t.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial__author",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:t.name}),t.identity&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"testimonial__identity",children:["..... ",t.identity]})]})]})})},idx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"testimonials__arrow",onClick:nextSlide,"aria-label":"Next",children:">"})]})]});}export default TestimonialsSlider;
